item.title: WordPress Core Contributor Handbook
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: If you’ve ever asked “How can I contribute to WordPress?” then go check out the WordPress Core Contributor Handbook. While still early in development (you’ll see that some sections are just a stub list of topics that need to be covered) it is already worth reading if you are interested in how WordPress development works. […]
item.content:encoded:
If you’ve ever asked “How can I contribute to WordPress?” then go check out the WordPress Core Contributor Handbook. While still early in development (you’ll see that some sections are just a stub list of topics that need to be covered) it is already worth reading if you are interested in how WordPress development works.

A call been put out for someone to lead the work on the handbook.
